item.title: Home Page
item.description:
Hello and welcome to my blog!

This blog is mostly made for the purpose of my own learning, but if it helps you in anyway, great! I will be writing about my time at hacker school, and the wonderful things I'll be learning. If you haven't heard of hacker school, you should check it out here:
item.dc:creator: Leta Montopoli
